title: IT'S NO-FEE FRIDAY AT JAZZ AT LINCOLN CENTER! (SPONSORED)
description: Today only, skip the fees and save on tickets for any mainstage show! Whether you shop online, call, or visit the box office, you’ll pay NO facility or processing fees on any mainstage Jazz at Lincoln Center performance — just the ticket price. From the upcoming Big Band Holidays to The Unity Jazz Festival, Cool School and Hard Bop, The Real Ambassadors, and more, this is your chance to grab seats to some of the hottest jazz events of the season.
address: Jazz at Lincoln Center, Rose Theater or The Appel Room
cost: No facility or processing fees on ticket price
